name: Experimental: Full-Stack Application with Tabbed Mode add-on (Java)
description:
Jmix web application in Java. Application views are opened in tabs inside the main view.

Contains User Interface, Security, File Storage subsystems, Data Tools and the Tabbed Mode add-ons.
Uses embedded HSQL database.

You can change the database and include add-ons from the Marketplace at any time when working with the project.

CAUTION: the Tabbed Mode add-on is currently in the experimental state and can change significantly in the next Jmix release.
